TITLE: Episode 129 - The Martyr of Love with Troy Frasier
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined again by Troy Frasier of Revived Studios to learn about the man from whom Valentine's Day gets its name. Renowned saint, martyr, and legendary fighter of the lordship of Caesar, we will get to know St. Valentine and find out why we should know his name.
CONTENT: This week, we are joined again by Troy Frasier of Revived Studios to learn about the man from whom Valentine's Day gets its name. Renowned saint, martyr, and legendary fighter of the lordship of Caesar, we will get to know St. Valentine and find out why we should know his name.
